title: Adele Spoke About Falling For Her Husband And It's Cute As Hell
text:
She said: I could see in their eyes as they were listening to it on their headphones that it reminded them of something or someone. That’s what I wanted to remember, how it was I felt at the beginning of the relationship that inspired that record.
ID: 10645480 6. She went on to say that getting through the breakup and falling for Simon was “the best feeling on earth.” View this image › 
Kevin Winter / Getty Images ID: 10645438 Adele said:
Because as bad as a breakup can be, as bitter and horrible and messy as it can be, that feeling when you first fall for someone else is the best feeling on earth.
ID: 10645571 8. Before concluding with this lovely statement. She said:
Obviously I can’t go through those feelings because I’m married now. I’ve found my next person.
ID: 10645442 9. Brb, sobbing forever. View this image ›
